string.name: location_reason
string.value: Node Mode needs location access to share your GPS position with the OpenClaw Gateway when requested.

string.name: camera_reason
string.value: Node Mode needs camera access to capture photos and video when requested by the OpenClaw Gateway.

string.name: microphone_reason
string.value: Node Mode needs microphone access to record audio during video capture and screen recording.

string.name: sms_reason
string.value: Node Mode needs SMS access to send text messages when requested by the OpenClaw Gateway.

string.name: file_reason
string.value: AI assistant needs file access to read and write documents when requested.

string.name: motion_reason
string.value: Context awareness needs motion sensors to detect walking, sitting, and activity changes for smart suggestions.

string.name: calendar_reason
string.value: AI assistant needs calendar access to create events and reminders when requested.

string.name: health_reason
string.value: Context awareness reads heart rate data from wearable devices to detect activity and health state for smart suggestions.

string.name: notification_reason
string.value: AI assistant needs notification access to alert you when new messages arrive while the app is in the background.

string.name: bluetooth_reason
string.value: Context awareness needs Bluetooth access to detect connected audio devices and peripherals for smart suggestions.

string.name: wifi_reason
string.value: Context awareness needs WiFi info to learn location signals and detect when you arrive at or leave familiar places like home or work.
